content: quick beginner-friendly easter eggs perfect for last-minute easter decoration also a good stash-busting project materials needed cotton yarn in two colors crochet hook polyester fiberfill scissors yarn needle any yarn will work for this project i used two shades of each color to create these stripes but feel free to experiment with the colors wink copyright this pattern is intended for personal use only rewriting reselling distributing or copying this pattern isn t allowed you may sell the finished product created from this pattern
